start.content:
#!/bin/sh
PID_FILE=/var/run/engines/eleasticsearch.pid

export PID_FILE

. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh
wait_for_signal()
{
    while ! test -f /home/engines/run/flags/sig_term -o -f /home/engines/run/flags/sig_quit 
     do
      sleep 3600 &
      wait
     done
}


memory=`expr $Memory - 200`
cd /home/app/elasticsearch
ES_JAVA_OPTS=" -XX:UseAVX=0 -Xms${memory}m -Xmx${memory}m" ./bin/elasticsearch -Enode.name=$node_name &
echo $! > $PID_FILE

if ! test -f /home/app/state/creds/inited
 then
   password=_Engines_System(random(18)) #move this to a template file and then delete
   echo backup:$password > /home/app/state/creds/backup
   /home/app/elasticsearch/bin/elasticsearch-setup-passwords auto -b |grep PASSWORD >> /home/app/state/creds/initial
   curl -X POST "localhost:9200/_security/user/snapshot" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d'
{
  "password" : "'$password'",
  "roles" : [ "snapshot" ],
  "full_name" : "backup",
  "email" : "Backup@engines.internal",
  "metadata" : {
    "Usage" : "Backup"
  }
}
'

   touch /home/app/state/creds/inited
fi   
startup_complete
wait_for_signal
shutdown_complete

template_files.content:
path:
    data: /home/fs/data/
    logs: /home/fs/logs/
    repo: /home/fs/backup/

network:
  host: _site_
discovery:
  type: single-node


xpack:
  security:
    enabled: true
    authc:
      realms:        
        native:
          native1:
            order: 0
